howItWork.title: How I Approach Problems
howItWork.subtitle: Not through technology for technology's sake—but through business-first, human-centered innovation
howItWork.resultTagline: Result: Solutions that work for business, teams, and users

1.title: Business Outcomes First
1.desc: I start with: "What business problem are we solving?" Not: "What technology should we use?"
1.example: Delivery Hero needed revenue growth → Display Ads platform → 20% revenue increase

2.title: Out-of-Box Thinking
2.desc: I challenge assumptions and find creative solutions others miss. Innovation over convention.
2.example: BRITA: Prototyped AI-driven search optimization to future-proof for Google AI results

3.title: Empathetic Leadership
3.desc: I lead by enabling others, not commanding. Collaboration and empathy over hierarchy.
3.example: PACT: Aligned 100+ competing companies through facilitation, not force

4.title: Hands-On Execution
4.desc: I don't just advise—I architect, code, and deploy. From design to production.
4.example: SINE: Designed AND implemented PACT Catalog (Next.js, React, Java Spring Boot)

about.title: Prasad Tilloo
about.description: 15+ years delivering transformational outcomes across Cloud Modernization, Legacy System Migration, and AI/ML Infrastructure for Fortune 100 clients.

philosophy.title: My Leadership Philosophy
philosophy.quote: The best solutions come from understanding both the business problem AND the people solving it.

outcomes.title: Business Outcomes Over Technical Elegance
outcomes.desc: I measure success by business impact, not technical complexity. A simple solution that drives revenue beats an elegant one that doesn't.

innovation.title: Innovation Through Creative Problem-Solving
innovation.desc: I challenge assumptions and think outside the box. When everyone says 'it can't be done,' I ask 'why not?'

leadership.title: Servant Leadership & Empathy
leadership.desc: I lead by enabling others, not commanding them. My role is to remove obstacles, provide context, and empower teams.

execution.title: Hands-On Execution
execution.desc: I don't just strategize—I execute. I write code, design architectures, and deploy to production.

proof.title: The Architect's Proof
proof.p1: I don't just design systems; I ensure their survival and scale in the real world.
proof.p2: My career has been defined by complex transformations—from migrating legacy code to architecting global standards.
proof.quote: Prasad combines deep technical expertise with a rare ability to explain complex architectures to C-level stakeholders.

consulting.title: Tier-1 Consulting Pedigree
consulting.desc: Spent 5+ years leading high-stakes digital transformation initiatives.

cta.title: Ready to modernize your enterprise?
cta.subtitle: Whether you need a hands-on architect for a migration or a strategic leader for your engineering team, let's talk.

hero.title: Decarbonizing Supply Chains through <0>Data Transparency</0>
hero.subtitle: Facilitating engagement and community for shaping the global standards and digital platforms that enable Fortune 100 companies to exchange Scope 3 emissions data securely and at scale.

challenge.title: The Scope 3 Data Problem
challenge.desc: 90% of a company's carbon footprint lies in its supply chain (Scope 3). Yet, most companies rely on vague industry averages because they cannot get <0>primary data</0> from their thousands of suppliers.
points: Data silos across incompatible ERP systems
Security concerns sharing sensitive supplier data
